description:
Experience unparalleled warmth and comfort with these advanced Heated Liner gloves. Designed in collaboration with Ewool, a renowned Quebec-based company, it offers three customizable heat levels, allowing you to tailor the warmth to your exact preference. Versatility is key, and these heated liners seamlessly integrate with larger mitts or shells, providing an additional layer of protection for the most extreme weather conditions.

Charger compatible with both American and European outlets.

  • Upto 6h of warmth
  • 3 heat levels via heat button
  • 2h on high. 3h on regular. 6h on low
  • Recharge with magnetic charger
  • Zip pocket on cuff for the battery
  • Includes 2 x 22W battery & 1 charger
  • Each finger heated individually
  • IP67 Water resistant components
  • Touchscreen
name: Auclair Heated Liner Glove - Unisex
